question: Which Indian state has started online registration of crops by an initiative named e-Crop?
explanation:
The state of Andhra Pradesh has rolled out an initiative of online registration of crops named e-Crop.
The stateâ€™s Revenue and Agriculture Department officials will jointly register crops online. At village level, village revenue officers and the village agriculture assistants will register the names of the farmers, details of their land, bank account and about his crops cultivated.
